headline: EXCLUSIVE: BlackRock could bid for largest New York container terminal
summary: The world’s largest asset manager could back an effort by the world’s biggest container line to buy the busiest container terminal at the leading U.S. East Coast port. The post EXCLUSIVE: BlackRock could bid for largest New York container terminal appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Umicore - Transparency notifications by BlackRock, Inc.
summary: Transparency notifications by BlackRock, Inc. In accordance with article 14, § 1 of the law of 2 May 2007 on the disclosure of major holdings, Umicore was recently notified by BlackRock, Inc. that it has successively crossed the legal threshold of 5% for the direct voting rights and equivalent financial instruments downwards on 2 February 2026, upwards on 3 February 2026 and then downwards on 4 February 2026. headline: BlackRock's Rieder Is Looking to Emerging Markets

headline: Michael Saylor Loses $47 Billion Unrealized Profit As Bitcoin Dumps Below Strategy's Cost Basis
summary: Strategy (NASDAQ:MSTR) is now $630 million underwater on its Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) holdings, wiping out $47 billion in unrealized profits from just four months ago as Bitcoin plunged below the company’s $76,037 average cost basis. The Profit Wipeout Bitcoin fell 15% in the first four days of February, pushing Strategy’s position underwater for the first time since the company began accumulating in August 2020. The company is down on its total Bitcoin holdings as long as the price stays below $76

headline: Major shareholder announcement
summary: In accordance with section 30 of the Capital Markets Act, Pandora A/S hereby announces that BlackRock, Inc. has notified the company that it now holds 6,727,166 shares, corresponding to 8.51% of the total voting rights and share capital (previously 8.47%). Additionally, BlackRock, Inc. controls voting rights attached to financial instruments amounting to 1.45% (previously 1.55%). In total, BlackRock, Inc. control 9.97% of the company’s voting rights (previously 10.03%). ABOUT PANDORA Pandora is
